Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.listener

Interface ThemeListener.Export<T extends DynamicAppTheme>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the dynamic app theme.
All Superinterfaces:
ThemeListener<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicRemoteThemeFragment, DynamicThemeFragment, ThemeFragment
Enclosing interface:
ThemeListener<T extends DynamicAppTheme>
public static interface ThemeListener.Export<T extends DynamicAppTheme> extends ThemeListener<T>
Interface to listen the theme export events.

  • Method Details

    • getThemeBitmap

      @Nullable Bitmap getThemeBitmap(@Nullable ThemePreview<T> themePreview, int themeAction)
      This method will be called to return a bitmap.
      Parameters:
      themePreview - The theme preview associated with this listener.
      themeAction - The theme action associated with this listener.
      Returns:
      The theme bitmap.

    • getThemeExportTask

      @NonNull DynamicTask<?,?,?> getThemeExportTask(@Nullable DialogInterface dialog, int themeAction, @Nullable ThemePreview<T> themePreview)
      This method will be called to get the theme export task.
      Parameters:
      dialog - The dialog interface if applicable.
      themeAction - The theme action to be used.
      themePreview - The theme preview for the task.
      Returns:
      The DynamicTask to perform theme export operations.
